uhhh....what sort of world, what's most important in the build, mostly party or solo, what are you looking to get out of DD (e.g. lots of DR, some DR, just 5 levels for sneak immunity while you have action on the stack, etc). You're going to be stretched for stats if you try to "do it all" as you'll need your attack stat, CON for rage and possibly EDR, and wisdom 14 to get full Paladin spell use (that's not even counting attempting to use CHA for Divine feats since dwarves get a penalty there) and it also means you'll be limited in skill points since you're not human, wont have a lot of stats to go around, and assuming you want more Paladin and DD than Barbarian that's a lot of 2pt/level class levels. Also, I'd assume that alignment shifts aren't a problem since you have 2 classes that require lawful and 1 that can't be lawful.

you basically showed up to a car dealer and said "please build me a car" without giving any criteria...try to narrow it down a bit.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Brb8/Dwd30/Pal2 (your split is much lower DR; this split is 21/-)
Str17(32), Dex13, Con16, Wis8, Int14, Cha6
Brb1, Pal 2-3, Brb 4-7, Dwd 8-17, Brb 18-20 // Dwd 21-40 (can swap around pre-epic a bit if you want to reduce number of shifts)
After level 5 there will be a constant -10% XP penalty to deal with, if that matters.

Pre-epic feats: WF, dodge, toughness, Imp Crit, Power attack, cleave, grt cleave (blind fight is epic, unfortunately)
Epic feats: EWF, 5xGrt Str, OverCrit, DevCrit, Amor skin, Prowess, Blind Fight + one more bonus feat of choice 

There's enough skill points to max Discipline, Spellcraft18(20), Tumble 20(21) with 75 to use as needed.  You can max Conc if you expect to get taunted regularly.
DevCrit DC = 10 + 20 + 11 + 2 raging = 43 (base without equipment boosts to STR). Base HP around 630 or so with AB of 45 (710HP AB47 raging).

Rage will be 3x/day for 1 turn each use.

I'll leave you to figure saves and damage but I suggest either rapier or scimi as WoC for the most crit opps.  Vs. uber AC foes, you may want a higher base damage weapon if you so choose but with DevCrit you just want to stand there taking damage and swinging as often as possible waiting to crit.

If this isn't what you are looking for you are going to need to document the most significant idiosyncrasies of your server or your own preferences in more detail. Without being participants on your server (at least I have never played there), the guild members are all pretty much in the dark as to what this build needs to do.

edit: oops, corrected typo & furnished some more raging stats

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
KidMiracleman wrote:
I forgot to mention that DevCrit has been disabled. Not sure if that makes a difference
Naturally.  The build I furnished is one that will not be effective without DevCrit working.  Without it, crits are not an end-all like with killing blows, they just create more damage.  DevCrit DC means nothing now.

There are several options without going the DevCrit route.  You also didn't mention whether this was intended for PvM or PvP so I'll assume PvP for now.

I'd keep Power Attack but lose Cleave/Grt Cleave which are only useful in PvM and mainly when being flanked. Imp PA is needed instead.  You'll need to try to create as much damage as possible.  When you begin to face AC's beyond your capacity to hit them regularly (probably in the 65+ range), that's when to queue IPA mode.  Make that 5% count as much as possible.  If you find that your DR and HP soak are working well with a shield, you can explore chancing a 2-hand weapon like scythe that does x4 on crits.  But you'd need to refocus to take advantage, of course.  There should be room for Exotic proficiency if needed. Since you don't need BF at all, there's a spare feat pre-epic and another in epic.  In pre-epic, perhaps KD (or Exotic Prof as mentioned).  Mobility really does not get used with the way a DwD fights but is handy if you are displacing while in combat. It's a matter of combat style.

Without OverCrit/DevCrit in epic, there's room for two more Grt Str (total of 7x).  Take them for extra damage & AB (i.e. Str 17(34) ).  There are only 3 really useful bonus feats, Prowess, AS & EWF.  I guess 2x Epic Toughness for the two others else 20/- for some energy resistance help (it stacks with other non-feat sources).  Your choice.

Anyhoo...

Get in the habit of explaining in detail what you want in your request.  Include every possible factor that could affect how the toon will interact with the environment and/or  circumstance. Many guild members will not bother to reply to poorly-defined requests.  Believe it or not, we are all pressured by RL responsibilities, yet try to fit in a few moments to furnish some helpful advice when we can.  Please help make those moments efficient ones.  Thanks.  And good luck!
